mapper.sql: id AS "id" , sku_id AS "skuId" , warehouse_code AS "warehouseCode" , stock_item_code AS "stockItemCode" , stock_quantity AS "stockQuantity" , stock_memo AS "stockMemo" , stock_operation AS "stockOperation" , create_user_code AS "createUserCode" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_user_code AS "updateUserCode" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_user_code AS "deleteUserCode" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, sku_id = #{skuId}, warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode}, stock_item_code = #{stockItemCode}, stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity}, stock_memo = #{stockMemo}, stock_operation = #{stockOperation}, create_user_code = #{createUserCode}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_user_code = #{updateUserCode}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_user_code = #{deleteUserCode}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_prd_stock ( id, sku_id, warehouse_code, stock_item_code, stock_quantity, stock_memo, stock_operation, create_user_code, create_date, update_user_code, update_date, delete_user_code, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{skuId}, #{warehouseCode}, #{stockItemCode}, #{stockQuantity}, #{stockMemo}, #{stockOperation}, #{createUserCode}, #{createDate}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteUserCode}, #{deleteDate} )
